div.div: The mission of the Kendall Central School District is to provide the knowledge, skills, values and attitudes needed by students to live responsibly and to compete successfully in today's and tomorrow's world.

img.alt: Cierra Perrin is pictured at center holding up her apprenticeship t-shirt.-news image
